casebody.data:
Virginia Driskell MAYO, Joined by Her Husband, T. D. Mayo, Jr., Appellants, v. C. D. PIERCE, Trustee for W. M. Thomas, Bankrupt, Appellee. No. 10789. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 13, 1943. George Prendergast, of Marshall, Tex., for appellants. Otis Harold Woodrow, of Sherman, Tex., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, McCORD, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Corn Exchange Nat. Bank Co. v. Klauder, 318 U.S. 434, 63 S. Ct. 679, 87 L.Ed.-, 144 A.L.R. 1189, the judgment in this case is affirmed.
